question_text: Why is using desiccants more effective than rice for drying a liquid-damaged mobile device?
answer_options: Rice can damage the internal components
Desiccants absorb moisture much more effectively than rice
Rice attracts insects that can damage the device
correct_answer: Desiccants absorb moisture much more effectively than rice
explanation: While rice is commonly suggested, it doesn't absorb water very well. Desiccants (like silica gel packets) are much more effective at absorbing moisture from electronic devices.
